verses.verse: Ye <S%H859><s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> cut <S%H1413>yourselves,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> any <S%H7144>baldness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto himself, above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5971>nations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> abominable <S%H8441>thing.<s%>
These <S%H2063><s%> are the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H7794>ox,<s%> the <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> <S%H3775><s%> and the <S%H7716>goat,<s%> <S%H5795><s%>

The <S%H354>hart,<s%> and the <S%H6643>roebuck,<s%> and the fallow <S%H3180>deer,<s%> and the wild <S%H689>goat,<s%> and the <S%H1788>pygarg,<s%> and the wild <S%H8377>ox,<s%> and the <S%H2169>chamois.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> that <S%H6536>parteth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and <S%H8156>cleaveth<s%> the <S%H8157>cleft<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6541>claws,<s%> and <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> that ye shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H4480>chew<s%> <S%H5927><s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or of them that <S%H4480>divide<s%> <S%H6536><s%> the <S%H8156>cloven<s%> <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> <S%H853>as<s%> the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> and the <S%H768>hare,<s%> and the <S%H8227>coney:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5927>chew<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divide<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> therefore <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

And the <S%H2386>swine,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H6536>divideth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> yet cheweth <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you: ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H4480>flesh,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> their dead <S%H5038>carcass.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>These<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> shall ye eat: <S%H398><s%>
And <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> hath <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> ye may <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat;<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.
Of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>
But <S%H2088>these<s%> are they of <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat:<s%> the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H6538>ossifrage,<s%> and the <S%H5822>osprey,<s%>
And the <S%H7201>glede,<s%> and the <S%H344>kite,<s%> and the <S%H1772>vulture<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And the <S%H1323>owl,<s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the night <S%H8464>hawk,<s%> and the <S%H7828>cuckoo,<s%> and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
<S%H853><s%> The little <S%H3563>owl,<s%> and the great <S%H3244>owl,<s%> and the <S%H8580>swan,<s%>
And the <S%H6893>pelican,<s%> and the <S%H7360>gier-eagle,<s%> and the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%>
And the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> and the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H1744>lapwing,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
And <S%H3605>every<s%> creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H5775>flieth<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you: they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
But of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> ye may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that dieth of <S%H5038>itself:<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> it; <S%H176>or<s%> thou mayest <S%H4376>sell<s%> it unto an <S%H5237>alien:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

Thou shalt truly <S%H6237>tithe<s%> <S%H6237><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that the <S%H7704>field<s%> bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of thy <S%H1715>corn,<s%> of thy <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and of thine <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of thy <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of thy <S%H6629>flocks;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> be too <S%H7235>long<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> thee, so <S%H3588>that<s%> thou art not <S%H3201>able<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it; or <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> be too <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee:

Then shalt thou <S%H5414>turn<s%> it into <S%H3701>money,<s%> and bind <S%H6696>up<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and shalt <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>bestow<s%> that <S%H3701>money<s%> for <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H183>after,<s%> for <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> or for <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> or for <S%H3196>wine,<s%> or for strong <S%H7941>drink,<s%> or for <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7592>desireth:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thine <S%H1004>household,<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is within thy <S%H8179>gates;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him; <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

At the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of thine <S%H8393>increase<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and shalt lay it <S%H5117>up<s%> within thy gates: <S%H8179><s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> <S%H3588>(because<s%> he hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee,) and the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are within thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H6213>doest.<s%>
